title: Protestant Ref pol and soc effects to ca. 1550

content.question: Directions: The suggested writing time for this question is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your essay. In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. If time permits when you finish writing, check your work.Discuss the political and social consequences of the Protestant Reformation in the first half of the sixteenth century.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
